channel.title: Source trouble (run.bat)
channel.description:
Hey guys , im having trouble running my 508 server , i just started coding 508`s and i cannot evan run them on my computer , i dont know why ... anyway im using windows vista computer , the client runs fine and dancy , its just the source file.. i have my JDK [u]version 5.0 update 16[/u] and it still dosnt work , i can run 317`s fine and also 475`s its just 508`s thats the problem and i whould like to start coding them , here is my run.bat code -
[code]@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause[/code]
and that gives... -
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/rt5he5s.jpg[/img]
and then when i user this batch code -
[code]@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_16\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause[/code]
i get this -
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/srdgsr.jpg[/img]

item.title: Source trouble (run.bat)
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:7, topic:285345”]Try add this to your run.bat

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause
hope its work,.[/quote]He doesn’t even have JDK1.6.0_13 how do you expect that to work?

You could either try these 3 or I will fetch mine that works and I only have JDK1.6.0

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_16\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

Read full topic

Thanks you [u]VERY much

[cookie]-gives cookie-[/cookie]
